document_data.mainbody:
An Ethran was the a title carried by a novice Wychlaran whose skills had yet to be tested.
Ethrans fell under the complete control of their leading Hathrans and Othlors. An Ethrans rate of advancement often depended on their personal relationship with her superiors. Most Ethrans were clerics or sorcerers. Thousands of Ethrans were spread across Rashemen, usually serving as village healers or spirit-talkers.
Before partaking of their maiden journey outside of Rashemen, all ethrans were ordained within the Urlingwood.
